Enforces: Equal acceptance rate across sensitive subgroups.

Formula: $P_a(Y = i \mid \Yhat = i) = P_b(Y = i \mid \Yhat = i), \quad i \in \{0,1\}$
Enforces: Equal false omission rates ($FOR=\frac{FN}{PN}$) and false discovery rates ($FDR=\frac{FP}{PP}$) across sensitive subgroups
Equal false discovery rate across sensitive subgroups.

Formula: $P_a\left(\Yhat = 1 \mid Y = i\right) = P_b\left(\Yhat = 1 \mid Y = i\right), \hspace{3mm} i\in \{0,1\}$
Enforces: Equal false positive rates ($FPR=\frac{FP}{FP+TN}$) and false negative rates ($FNR=\frac{FN}{FN+TP}$) across sensitive subgroups.
Equal false positive rates across sensitive subgroups.
Equal false negative rates across sensitive subgroups.
